Detailed Description

The declarations of the events and the scheduler.

Author:
Ignacy Gawedzki
Date:
Fri Sep 26 16:06:29 2003
The global scheme goes like this:
  • For I/O events, use poll() in a loop
  • For timed events, use poll()'s timeout.
